content:
From: Paolo Crisafulli <paolo.crisafulli@irt-systemx.fr>
Hi all,

When run, isabelle_scala_script raises the following warnings:

bad option '-howtorun:script' was ignored
bad option '-nocompdaemon' was ignored

To reproduce this behaviour, just go to your Isabelle install home dir,
then run bin/isabelle_scala_script with no args.

It seems the scala executable version >=3 does not support these options
any more, as isabelle scala -help does not list them.

Should this be filed as a bug?

Hope this helps, just a little.

Have a good day,

Paolo Crisafulli

From: Paolo Crisafulli <paolo.crisafulli@irt-systemx.fr>
Thank you very much for your answer and the entry points.

Have a good day,

Paolo
